title: Microwave Beef Enchiladas
nutrition_tip: Cook these cheesy beef enchiladas entirely in your microwave in less than 30 min…

steps.text: Crumble beef into a 2 quart microwave-safe casserole and stir in the chopped onion. Cover loosely and microwave on high for 4-5 minutes until the beef reaches 155° F. Stir every 2 minutes.
Once the meat is cooked, stir to break up the meat and drain the extra fat into a spare bowl and throw away when cool.
Stir in the spinach, 3/4 cup shredded cheese, yogurt, salt and pepper. Cover and set aside.
Warm tortillas in the microwave if desired.
Spoon ⅓ cup filling into the center and fold up. Lay flat in the casserole pan with the seam facing down.
Mix all ingredients for the enchilada sauce in a microwave safe container. Cover and microwave on high for 4-6 minutes.
Pour sauce over tortillas and microwave again on high for 7-9 minutes.
